info.title: API Documentation
info.description: This is the documentation for NLP Semantic Search and Article Scrapper APIs.

tags.name: Semantic Search
tags.description: Endpoints related to Semantic Search using the NLP API

get.description: This endpoint retrieves documents based on semantic search criteria. You can filter the results using various parameters such as page number, page limit, search term, country, document type, language, start date, and end date.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number for pagination.

parameters.name: page_limit
parameters.description: The number of results to return per page.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: The search term used to filter the results.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: The ISO 3 code of the country used to filter the results.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Array of types of documents. Available document types include: action plan, solution, experiment, blogs, publications, document, news, stories, speeches, webpage, toolkit, event, project.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The language code (ISO 639-1) used to filter the results.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The start date for filtering the results (format: Month, Year).

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: The end date for filtering the results (format: Month, Year).

post.description: This endpoint allows you to retrieve metadata such as language and locations from a document using the Semantic Search API. You can select which metadata modules to return as an array.

parameters.name: modules
parameters.description: Select which metadata to return as an array. Available modules are 'language' and 'location'.

requestBody.description: Select your preferred method of sending the document: application/json, text/plain, or multipart/form-data.

file.description: Upload a file containing the content to be processed by the NLP API.

schema.description: Plain text content to be processed by the NLP API.

document.description: The content to be processed by the NLP API.

get.summary: Search for Articles from the Scrapper
get.description: This endpoint allows you to search for articles from the Scrapper database. You can filter the results based on various parameters such as page number, search term, country, document type, language, etc.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number for pagination.

parameters.name: page_content_limit
parameters.description: The number of results to return per page.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: The search term used to filter the results.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: The ISO 3 code of the country used to filter the results.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Array of types of documents. Available document types include: blogs, publications, document, news, stories, speeches, webpage, toolkit, event, project.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The language code (ISO 639-1) used to filter the results.

post.description: This endpoint allows you to retrieve the content of a webpage. Optionally, you can embed the web content into the NLP module by setting `embed_data` to true. To access this endpoint, you need an authorization key provided by the system admin. Additionally, an authentication token must be included in the request, which can be retrieved from the user's profile on the SDG Commons Innovation platform.

url.description: The URL of the webpage to process

embed_data.description: Set to true to embed data using the NLP API

auth_key.description: Authorization key provided by the system admin

ApiKeyAuth.name: apikey
ApiKeyAuth.description: API key for accessing protected endpoints and documents with elevated privilege that are not public by default. Please get API token from your SDG Innovation Commons profile page.
